intro: Tephrosia purpurea var. yunnanensis, commonly known as Yunnan purple tephrosia, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Fabaceae family, characterized by its compound leaves and pod fruits. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions and is adapted to temperate climates. Its flowers are usually purple or pink, with a distinctive spurred petal. It is sometimes cultivated for ornamental purposes due to its attractive appearance.
